messages.message: :wave: got the `VpcLimitExceeded` error when I tried to provision a new sandbox (https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/instabase-sandbox-provisionser/1476/), should we bump the limit or maybe I missed something in the parameters for that jenkins job?  cc @Xi Cheng @Heymian
Weâ€™re out of capacity in AWS. Let me free up some space for you.
@shiqi can you now rerun the above pipeline? before someone claims the space.
Thanks! I just restarted the Jenkins job, just curious on the process here, sounds like if somebody else needs to provision a new sandbox they probably will get the same error?
Right now yes as there are ~50 sandboxes which is our current limit. There is no automated pipeline yet for deleting the old sandboxes so I manually do it.
